A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
A backend application that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
A health survey form interface for users to input and submit health information
Data management functionality to store and organize submitted survey responses
User permission management system to control access to data and features
Data review interface for authorized personnel to view and validate submissions
Reporting dashboard to display aggregated health data insights
Responsive web design with whitesmoke background and dark cyan styled components
Authentication system to manage user sessions and roles
Survey form validation to ensure complete and accurate data submission
Data export functionality for administrators to download survey results
Audit logging for tracking data access and modifications
Role-based access control for different user types (e.g., survey takers, reviewers, admins)
Concurrent development setup with npm scripts for installing dependencies and running both frontend and backend
Database schema design to support health survey data storage and retrieval
